p: 4-Cyano-3-[4-(2-cyanophenyl)phenyl]-5-ethyl-1-methylpyrrole-2-carboxylic acid (279 mg) is dissolved in a 1:1:1 v/v/v mixture (6 mL) of DMF/ MIPK/ acetone at RT. Heptane (12 mL) is added to the clear solution. After the solution is stirred for about 24 hours, the solid is isolated by vacuum filtration to provide the title compound.
